item.description: This Wednesday, there is no officially scheduled event.  However, for those of you who just have to have your fix, I've made this event as a means of organizing yourselves for the purpose of some open gaming, be it board, card, or tabletop game, at Veteran's at the usual time.  Use the comments area to discuss what you might be interested in or what you'd like to bring to play Wednesday night and see who's interested in attending.  I may drop in though my schedule will make it difficult, hence why there's no official event planned.  Feel free to bring whatever cool new games you've got, but make a posting on here so people know what it is you're planning to bring.
item.name: Open Gaming, You Decide What to Play
